content: CFS-TTS Firestop Top Track Seal Firestop Preformed solution for top-of-wall drywall joints – eliminates the need for slow, messy caulk ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Ready to use joints and cavity barriers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast installation – fewer working steps (one and done) Sealing properties designed for real jobsite conditions – forms a more reliable sound and smoke barrier even on imperfect concrete No mess, zero waste – no caulking or tools required Makes inspection easier Versatile solution for any drywall track size Applications Firestop, smoke and sound seal for head-of-wall joints between top track and gypsum to flat concrete slabs CFS-TTS 212/358/600 are designed for a perfect friction fit with common track sizes – 2 1/2, 3 5/8 and 6 CFS-TTS OS is designed for a flexible solution for various track applications For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA:LEED VOC: 22 g/lApprovals: UL 2079Length: 120.5 in Technical Data | Approvals | UL 2079 | Length | 120.5 in | Application | Joints | Movement | Yes | Storage and transportation temperature range | 14 - 122 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2275179 - Firestop top track seal CFS-TTS 212 - Package Size 20 pc - 2275178 - Firestop top track seal CFS-TTS R OS - Package Size 20 pc - 2217391 - CFS-TTS 600 FIRESTOP TOP TRACK SEAL - Package Size 20 pc - 3852333 - CFS-TTS R OS + BX3-22 + B22 85 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x BX 3-22 03 Batt.-actuated tool - 1x BX 3 / L / ME-22 Tool case - 1x C 6-22 110-127V Battery charger - 120x Firestop top track seal CFS-TTS R OS - 2x B 22-85 Li-ion Battery pack
